solutionsSection.description_p: Financial insolvency is not a crime; it's a reality that can affect anyone. At ATTLAS, we protect your right to dignity, equality, and financial justice, in accordance with the principles of International Human Rights. Because starting over is not a privilege; it's a fundamental right.

solutionsSection.onu_desa:
The Attlas Org Foundation, REGISTERED in the database of the United Nations Department of Economic and Social Affairs (UN DESA - ONU), promotes the project "Colombia Debt Relief: A New Beginning", an initiative supported by the law firm Propensiones Internacional.

This program represents an innovative model of economic justice, designed to strengthen asset recovery and financial stability for vulnerable sectors through advanced legal mechanisms and specialized financial strategies. Based on the principles of international cooperation and sustainable development, this project not only seeks to alleviate the economic burdens of thousands of families, but also to establish a legal framework that guarantees their social inclusion and long-term stability.

whyUsSection.description_p: We defend financial justice with dignity, recognizing that financial insolvency is not a crime, but a reality that anyone can face. We are committed to providing fair solutions, without discrimination or stigma, supporting the human right to a new beginning. Grounded in the principles of International Human Rights, ATTLAS protects equality and financial justice, ensuring that every person can regain their financial footing with support and respect.
